name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free OCR extract text from ActiveTab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is actually text scaner that capture active tab's target area and extract text from it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is actually text scanner that capture active tab's target area and extract text from it. This text scanner can extract several languages, Text can be in any language
after capturing text you can copy to clipboard on single click
